txt.en: Gellamiel can be found in Ost Galadh.\n\nYou should speak with Gellamiel.
Roving Threat: Woe-weaver, the Silent Fear
Powerful creatures have been seen patrolling the hostile region of Southern Mirkwood, including Woe-weaver, a poisonous giant spider.
Woe-weaver can be found somewhere in Southern Mirkwood.\n\nYou should defeat Woe-weaver.

'More spiders have descended upon Mirkwood. They come from the direction of Dol Guldur. Of all we have encountered, Woe-weaver is the deadliest. Be careful, this giant spider can paralyze even the strongest warrior.'
'The forces of Dol Guldur may outnumber us but our hope outshines all. You have done a great service for the Malledhrim.'
